I don't know how to get it working on M33 firmwares. I use 3.30 oe-? and it doesn't need a keys.bin file, just the eboot.pbp. To play, put the eboot.pbp in msROOT/PSP/GAME/SLES####, Where is SLES####, you must put in the code Sony gave the game (can also be SLUS or something else, depending what region the game is from)
you don't need keys.bin cuz "AutoPopstation4" puts it in the eboot.pbp file automaticly. works fine for me
